attributes.action: Appoint a new Motorsport Governing Body to replace the MSA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With all the changes that the MSA are bringing into regulate people who compete and banning "specials" and pricing out the club person competitor, we as a rally community think that the MSA should be replaced with  more "acceptable body" that is run for comptitors by competitors
